description: Run Intel MPI-1 Benchmark PingPong between all node pairs in selected nodes, on which Intel MPI should be installed as prerequisite.

parameters.name: Packet size
parameters.description: Specify the size(0-22, as exponent of 2) of transfer messages used in testing. Sizes from 2^0 to 2^22 bytes will be included in testing if the value is 0.

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description: Select the way to run tasks, in each of which MPI Pingpong run between a node pair.

parameters.name: Intel MPI location
parameters.description: Specify the location of Intel MPI that is installed on the nodes.

parameters.name: Max runtime
parameters.description: Specify the max time in seconds the test could run.
